original_text: You have had many troubles as believers. I want those troubles to help you. Surely they could not be without any good purpose.
korean_text: 너희가 이같이 많은 괴로움을 헛되이 받았느냐 과연 헛되냐

sentences.original_text: You have had many troubles as believers.
sentences.korean_translation: 믿는 자로서 너희는 많은 환난을 겪었다.

sentences.original_text: I want those troubles to help you.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그 환난들이 너희를 돕기를 원한다.

sentences.original_text: Surely they could not be without any good purpose.
sentences.korean_translation: 분명 그들은 어떤 선한 목적 없이 존재할 수 없었다.
